casebody.data:
Harry MITCHELL, Appellant, v. A. C. ADERHOLD, Warden of the United States Penitentiary, Atlanta, Georgia, Appellee. No. 6461. Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Feb. 19, 1932. Harry Mitchell, of Atlanta, Ga., in pro. per. Clint W. Hager, U. S. Atty., and Hal Lindsay, Asst. U. S. Atty., both of Atlanta, Ga., for appellee.

Before BRYAN, FOSTER, and WALKER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

On the authority of Maceo v. United States (C. C. A.) 46 F.(2d) 788, the judgment is affirmed.
